Topic Summary: Exemption from VAT on Psychotherapy and Counselling Services
Tax Legislation: Section 51, Part 1 of Schedule 1, Schedule 3 Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010; Chapter 2 of Title IX of Council Directive 2006/112/EC - Article 131(c); Recital (7) of the Directive; Sections 3 and 4 of The Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005;
